Class LocalFileRepository

java.lang.Object
infrastructures.filesystem.LocalFileRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileRepository
public class LocalFileRepository extends Object implements FileRepository
Local file system implementation of FileRepository. Provides file and directory operations on the local file system.

      public void create(Path directory, String filename) throws FileAlreadyExistsException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Creates a new file in the specified directory.
      Specified by:
      create in interface FileRepository
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path where the file will be created
      filename - the name of the file to create
      Throws:
      FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file already exists
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other file system errors

      filename - the name of the file to read
      Returns:

      Creates a new directory in the specified location.
      Specified by:
      createRepository in interface FileRepository
      Parameters:
      directory - the parent directory path
      directoryName - the name of the new directory to create
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the directory name is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other file system errors
      FileAlreadyExistsException - if the directory already exists

    • listFiles

      public String listFiles(Path directoryName) throws IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Lists all files and directories in the specified directory. Directories are displayed in blue with a trailing slash, files in white.
      Specified by:
      listFiles in interface FileRepository
      Parameters:
      directoryName - the path of the directory to list
      Returns:
      a formatted string of file and directory names
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the directory does not exist or is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other file system errors

    • isDirectory

      public Boolean isDirectory(Path path) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the given path is a directory.
      Specified by:
      isDirectory in interface FileRepository
      Parameters:
      path - the path to check
      Returns:
      true if the path is a directory, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the path is null

    • update

      public String update(Path directory, String filename, String newContent) throws FileNotFoundException, FileNotReadableException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Updates the content of a file.
      Specified by:
      update in interface FileRepository
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path containing the file
      filename - the name of the file to update
      newContent - the new content to write to the file
      Returns:
      the updated content of the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
      FileNotReadableException - if the file is not writable
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other file system errors
